class.name: wxWizard
class.description: wxWizard is the central class for implementing 'wizard-like' dialogs.

flag.name: wxWIZARD_EX_HELPBUTTON
flag.description: Shows a Help button using wxID_HELP.

bitmap.label: Bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap to display on the left side of the wizard (default: none).

event.name: wxWizardEvent
event.description: wxWizardEvent class represents an event generated by the wxWizard: this event is first sent to the page itself and, if not processed there, goes up the window hierarchy as usual.

type.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_CANCEL
type.description: The user attempted to cancel the wizard (this event may also be vetoed).

type.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_FINISHED
type.description: The wizard finished button was pressed.

type.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_HELP
type.description: The wizard help button was pressed.

type.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_PAGE_CHANGED
type.description: The page has just been changed (this event cannot be vetoed).

type.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_PAGE_CHANGING
type.description: The page is being changed (this event can be vetoed).

type.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_PAGE_SHOWN
type.description: The page was shown and laid out (this event cannot be vetoed).
